page.title: 07ITCHEN VALLEY PC (2)
page.content:
(e) The Clerk was instructed to write to Winchester City Council to ask for the Old Well in Avington to be classed as a {Listed Building} (f) Reference was made to the recently opened {M3 Motorway}which runs through the Itchen Valley to the west of our area. It was suggested that Exit 7 on the motorway should have 'King's Worthy' added to it.
Although the above meeting has no direct reference to our area or block,it still gives a good idea of how a Parish Council operateas in 1985. It should be remembered,however,that our area comes under the administration of this Parish Council.
